instructions: From any Home screen, tap the Apps icon. Tap Settings . Scroll to 'PHONE' and tap Date & time . Select the following check boxes: Automatic date & time Automatic time zone

From any Home screen, tap the Apps icon. Tap Settings . Scroll to 'PHONE' and tap Date & time . Clear the following check boxes: Automatic date & time Automatic time zone Manually update the following by tapping each and following the prompts: Set date Set time Select time zone Use 24-hour format Choose date format
